articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Receive between $2K - $30K to build out your ideas via the @womenbuildweb3 accelerator program 🔥
The program takes place online, so anyone in the world can participate.
Applications still open for a short time. Kicks off on Oct 13th! 🛠
WBW3 - BUIDL Accelerator: GM buildoooors, we’re very excited to announce that the application for our accelerator program is NOW LIVE! 🚀
We’re giving out no strings attached grants of $2K - $30K to support innovative engineering projects ✨🧵
More details and application:
 https://www.womenbuildweb3.com/accelerator https://twitter.com/encodeclub/status/1574792333400281088

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Radek | velvetshark.eth
After a @developer_dao workshop by @dabit3 this Wednesday, I'll run my own with them on Friday.
Tune in to see how to create on-chain SVG NFTs. From zero to live collection in one hour!
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Then we have @velvet_shark walking us through how to create & deploy a 100% on-chain SVG NFT 😎 💅
Tune in on Friday @ 4:30pm UTC 👉
Don't miss these they're set to be excellent sessions with two awseomse educators from the D_D Community.
 https://youtu.be/Hfga2UjupVU

Thank you for the love, gang gang!

articles.description:
”We’re going to pass on the investment but thanks for your time”
*ends zoom meeting*
It’s the 16th time you’ve heard that in the last two weeks. 
We get it. 
Raising money, getting grants, and taking your product to market can be tough these days 
But it doesn’t have to be…
